af.latex: Vereenvoudig (neem aan dat geen noemer gelyk aan nul is nie):
af.html: Vereenvoudig (neem aan dat geen noemer gelyk aan nul is nie):

en.latex: What are the restrictions in the following:
en.html: What are the restrictions in the following:

af.latex: Wat is die beperkings in die volgende:
af.html: Wat is die beperkings in die volgende:

en.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{y^{2} - x^{2}} \\&
= \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{x(y - x) + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{xy - x^{2} + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
=\frac{xy}{(x + y)(y - x)} \end{align} \)

Note restriction: \( x \neq \pm y \) .
en.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{y^{2} - x^{2}} \\&
= \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{x(y - x) + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{xy - x^{2} + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
=\frac{xy}{(x + y)(y - x)} \end{align} \)

Note restriction: \( x \neq \pm y \) .

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{y^{2} - x^{2}} \\&
= \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{x(y - x) + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{xy - x^{2} + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
=\frac{xy}{(x + y)(y - x)} \end{align} \)

Beperking: \( x \neq \pm y \) .
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{y^{2} - x^{2}} \\&
= \frac{x}{x + y} + \frac{x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{x(y - x) + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
= \frac{xy - x^{2} + x^{2}}{(y + x)(y - x)} \\&
=\frac{xy}{(x + y)(y - x)} \end{align} \)

Beperking: \( x \neq \pm y \) .

af.latex:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{12}{x-12} - \frac{6}{x-6} \\&
= \frac{12(x-6) - 6(x-12)}{(x-12)(x-6)} \\&
= \frac{12x-72 - 6x+72}{(x-12)(x-6)} \\&
= \frac{6x}{(x-12)(x-6)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperking: \( x \neq 12 \) en \( x \neq 6 \)
af.html:
\( \begin{align} & \frac{12}{x-12} - \frac{6}{x-6} \\&
= \frac{12(x-6) - 6(x-12)}{(x-12)(x-6)} \\&
= \frac{12x-72 - 6x+72}{(x-12)(x-6)} \\&
= \frac{6x}{(x-12)(x-6)} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperking: \( x \neq 12 \) en \( x \neq 6 \)

af.latex:
\( egin{align} & rac{2}{xy} + rac{4}{xz} + rac{3}{yz}\&
= rac{2z}{xyz} + rac{4y}{xyz} + rac{3x}{xyz} \&
= rac{2z + 4y + 3x}{xyz} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x eq 0 \) ; \( y eq 0 \) en \( z eq 0 \) .
af.html:
\( egin{align} & rac{2}{xy} + rac{4}{xz} + rac{3}{yz}\&
= rac{2z}{xyz} + rac{4y}{xyz} + rac{3x}{xyz} \&
= rac{2z + 4y + 3x}{xyz} \end{align} \)

Let op die beperkings: \( x eq 0 \) ; \( y eq 0 \) en \( z eq 0 \) .

en.latex:
We need to find the value of \( x \) that will make the denominator equal to \( 0 \) .

Therefore:

\( \begin{align} &x - 2 \neq 0 \\&
x \neq 2 \end{align} \)
en.html:
We need to find the value of \( x \) that will make the denominator equal to \( 0 \) .

Therefore:

\( \begin{align} &x - 2 \neq 0 \\&
x \neq 2 \end{align} \)

af.latex:
Ons moet die waarde van \( x \) bepaal wat die noemer gelyk aan \( 0 \) sal maak.

Daarom:

\( \begin{align} &x - 2 \neq 0 \\&
x \neq 2 \end{align} \)
af.html:
Ons moet die waarde van \( x \) bepaal wat die noemer gelyk aan \( 0 \) sal maak.

Daarom:

\( \begin{align} &x - 2 \neq 0 \\&
x \neq 2 \end{align} \)

en.latex:
First simplify the fraction:

\( rac{3x -9}{4x + 4} = rac{3(x -1)}{4(x + 1)} \)

Now we can determine the restriction:
\( egin{align} & 4(x + 1) eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \&
x eq -1 \end{align} \)
en.html:
First simplify the fraction:

\( rac{3x -9}{4x + 4} = rac{3(x -1)}{4(x + 1)} \)

Now we can determine the restriction:
\( egin{align} & 4(x + 1) eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \&
x eq -1 \end{align} \)

af.latex:
Vereenvoudig eers die breuk:

\( rac{3x -9}{4x + 4} = rac{3(x -1)}{4(x + 1)} \)

Nou kan ons die beperking bepaal:
\( egin{align} & 4(x + 1) eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \&
x eq -1 \end{align} \)
af.html:
Vereenvoudig eers die breuk:

\( rac{3x -9}{4x + 4} = rac{3(x -1)}{4(x + 1)} \)

Nou kan ons die beperking bepaal:
\( egin{align} & 4(x + 1) eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \&
x eq -1 \end{align} \)

en.latex:
First simplify the fraction:

\( rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{x^2 - 1} = rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{(x - 1)(x + 1)} \)

Now we can determine the restrictions.
There are three restrictions in this case:
\( egin{align} & x eq 0 \&
x - 1 eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \end{align} \)

Therefore: \( x eq 0 ext{ and } x eq \pm 1 \)
en.html:
First simplify the fraction:

\( rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{x^2 - 1} = rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{(x - 1)(x + 1)} \)

Now we can determine the restrictions.
There are three restrictions in this case:
\( egin{align} & x eq 0 \&
x - 1 eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \end{align} \)

Therefore: \( x eq 0 ext{ and } x eq \pm 1 \)

af.latex:
Vereenvoudig eers die breuk:

\( rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{x^2 - 1} = rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{(x - 1)(x + 1)} \)

Nou kan ons die beperkings bepaal.
Daar is drie beperkings in hierdie geval:
\( egin{align} & x eq 0 \&
x - 1 eq 0 \&
x + 1 eq 0 \end{align} \)

Daarom: \( x eq 0 ext{ en } x eq \pm 1 \)
af.html:
Vereenvoudig eers die breuk:

\( rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{x^2 - 1} = rac{3}{x} - rac{1}{(x - 1)(x + 1)} \)

Nou kan ons die beperkings bepaal.
Daar is drie beperkings in hierdie geval:

x + 1 eq 0 \end{align} \)

Daarom: \( x eq 0 ext{ en } x eq \pm 1 \)
